49  @Keywords(location = "Java", tabTitle = "External Formatter", keywords = { "eclipse", "google", "external", "format", "formatter", "eclipse formatter", "google formatter", "external formatter" })
50  public class ExternalFormatterPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements VerifiableConfigPanel {
51  	private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger(ExternalFormatterPanel.class.getName());
52  
53  	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
54  
55  	private transient final Collection<ChangeListener> changeListeners = new ArrayList<>();
56  
57  	private transient final Preferences preferences;
58  
59  	private final boolean showsProjectSettings;
60  
61  	public ExternalFormatterPanel(Preferences preferences, boolean showsProjectSettings) {
62  		this.preferences = preferences;
63  		this.showsProjectSettings = showsProjectSettings;
64  
65  		initComponents();
66  		updateEnabledState();
67  
68  		formatterLocField.getDocument().addDocumentListener(new DocumentListener() {
69  			/**
70  			 * {@inheritDoc}
71  			 */
72  			@Override
73  			public void insertUpdate(DocumentEvent e) {
74  				fireChangedListener();
75  			}
76  
77  			/**
78  			 * {@inheritDoc}
79  			 */
80  			@Override
81  			public void removeUpdate(DocumentEvent e) {
82  				fireChangedListener();
83  			}
84  
85  			/**
86  			 * {@inheritDoc}
87  			 */
88  			@Override
89  			public void changedUpdate(DocumentEvent e) {
90  				fireChangedListener();
91  			}
92  		});
93  
94  		cbSourceLevel.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
95  			/**
96  			 * {@inheritDoc}
97  			 */
98  			@Override
99  			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
100 				fireChangedListener();
101 			}
102 		});
103 
104 		this.cbEnableSaveActionModifiedLinesOnly.setVisible(Settings.FEATURE_FORMAT_CHANGED_LINES_ONLY);
105 		this.cbEnableSaveActionModifiedLinesOnly.setEnabled(Settings.FEATURE_FORMAT_CHANGED_LINES_ONLY);
106 	}
107 
108 	public Preferences getPreferences() {
109 		return preferences;
110 	}
111 
112 	public void addChangeListener(ChangeListener listener) {
113 		changeListeners.add(listener);
114 	}
115 
116 	public void removeChangeListener(ChangeListener listener) {
117 		changeListeners.remove(listener);
118 	}
119 
120 	private void fireChangedListener() {
121 		for (ChangeListener changeListener : changeListeners) {
122 			changeListener.stateChanged(null);
123 		}
124 	}

531 	private void btnDonateMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_btnDonateMouseClicked
532 		try {
533 			HtmlBrowser.URLDisplayer.getDefault().showURLExternal(new URL("https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=926F5XBCTK2LQ&source=url"));
534 		} catch (MalformedURLException ex) {
535 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(ex);
536 		}
537 	}//GEN-LAST:event_btnDonateMouseClicked
538 
539 	private void btnVisitHomePageMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_btnVisitHomePageMouseClicked
540 		try {
541 			HtmlBrowser.URLDisplayer.getDefault().showURLExternal(new URL("https://github.com/funfried/externalcodeformatter_for_netbeans/"));
542 		} catch (MalformedURLException ex) {
543 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(ex);
544 		}
545 	}//GEN-LAST:event_btnVisitHomePageMouseClicked
546 
547 	private void browseButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_browseButtonActionPerformed
548 		//The default dir to use if no value is stored
549 		File home = new File(System.getProperty("user.home"));
550 		final FileNameExtensionFilter fileNameExtensionFilterXML = new FileNameExtensionFilter("Eclipse formatter (*.xml)", "xml");
551 		final FileNameExtensionFilter fileNameExtensionFilterEPF = new FileNameExtensionFilter("Workspace mechanic (*.epf)", "epf");
552 		final FileFilter fileNameExtensionFilterProjectSetting = new FileFilter() {
553 	/**
554 	 * {@inheritDoc}
555 	 */
556 			@Override
557 			public boolean accept(File f) {
558 				if (f.isDirectory()) {
559 					return true;
560 				}
561 				return Settings.PROJECT_PREF_FILE.equals(f.getName());
562 			}
563 
564 	/**
565 	 * {@inheritDoc}
566 	 */
567 			@Override
568 			public String getDescription() {
569 				return "Eclipse project settings (" + Settings.PROJECT_PREF_FILE + ")";
570 			}
571 		};
572 		//Now build a file chooser and invoke the dialog in one line of code
573 		//"user-dir" is our unique key
574 		File toAdd = new FileChooserBuilder("user-dir").setFileHiding(false).setFilesOnly(true).setTitle("Choose configuration ...").setDefaultWorkingDirectory(home).setApproveText("Choose")
575 				.addFileFilter(fileNameExtensionFilterProjectSetting).addFileFilter(fileNameExtensionFilterXML).addFileFilter(fileNameExtensionFilterEPF).setFileFilter(fileNameExtensionFilterXML)
576 				.showOpenDialog();
577 		//Result will be null if the user clicked cancel or closed the dialog w/o OK
578 		if (toAdd != null) {
579 			loadEclipseFormatterFileForPreview(toAdd.getAbsolutePath(), getSelectedProfile());
580 		}
581 	}//GEN-LAST:event_browseButtonActionPerformed
582

651 
652 	private String getSelectedProfile() {
653 		if (null != cbProfile.getSelectedItem()) {
654 			return cbProfile.getSelectedItem().toString();
655 		} else {
656 			return "";
657 		}
658 	}
659 
660 	/**
661 	 * {@inheritDoc}
662 	 */
663 	@Override
664 	public void load() {
665 		String enabledFormatter = preferences.get(Settings.ENABLED_FORMATTER, NetBeansFormatterStrategy.ID);
666 
667 		boolean googleFormatterEnabled = GoogleFormatterStrategy.ID.equals(enabledFormatter);
668 		String googleFormatterCodeStyle = preferences.get(Settings.GOOGLE_FORMATTER_CODE_STYLE, JavaFormatterOptions.Style.GOOGLE.name());
669 		String eclipseFormatterLocation = preferences.get(Settings.ECLIPSE_FORMATTER_LOCATION, "");
670 		String eclipseFormatterProfile = preferences.get(Settings.ECLIPSE_FORMATTER_ACTIVE_PROFILE, "");
671 		boolean eclipseFormatterEnabled = EclipseFormatterStrategy.ID.equals(enabledFormatter);
672 		boolean showNotifications = preferences.getBoolean(Settings.SHOW_NOTIFICATIONS, false);
673 		boolean enableSaveAction = preferences.getBoolean(Settings.ENABLE_SAVEACTION, false);
674 		boolean enableSaveActionModifiedLines = preferences.getBoolean(Settings.ENABLE_SAVEACTION_MODIFIEDLINESONLY, false);
675 		boolean useIndentationSettings = preferences.getBoolean(Settings.ENABLE_USE_OF_INDENTATION_SETTINGS, true);
676 		boolean overrideTabSize = preferences.getBoolean(Settings.OVERRIDE_TAB_SIZE, false);
677 		int overrideTabSizeValue = preferences.getInt(Settings.OVERRIDE_TAB_SIZE_VALUE, 4);
678 		boolean preserveBreakpoints = preferences.getBoolean(Settings.PRESERVE_BREAKPOINTS, true);
679 		boolean useProjectPrefs = preferences.getBoolean(Settings.USE_PROJECT_PREFS, true);
680 		String lineFeed = preferences.get(Settings.LINEFEED, "");
681 		String sourceLevel = preferences.get(Settings.SOURCELEVEL, "");
682 
683 		loadOptionsWindowUI(googleFormatterEnabled, googleFormatterCodeStyle, eclipseFormatterEnabled, eclipseFormatterLocation, eclipseFormatterProfile, showNotifications, enableSaveAction,
684 				preserveBreakpoints, useProjectPrefs, enableSaveActionModifiedLines, useIndentationSettings, overrideTabSize, overrideTabSizeValue, lineFeed, sourceLevel);
685 
686 		fireChangedListener();
687 	}
688 
689 	private void loadOptionsWindowUI(boolean googleFormatterEnabled, String googleFormatterCodeStyle, boolean eclipseFormatterEnabled, String formatterFile, String profile, boolean showNotifications,
690 			boolean enableSaveAction, boolean preserveBreakpoints, boolean useProjectPrefs, boolean enableSaveActionModifiedLines, boolean useIndentationSettings, boolean overrideTabSize,
691 			int overrideTabSizeValue, String lineFeed, String sourceLevel) {
692 		loadEclipseFormatterFileForPreview(formatterFile, profile);
693 
694 		if (eclipseFormatterEnabled) {
695 			formatterBtnGrp.setSelected(rbUseEclipse.getModel(), true);
696 		} else if (googleFormatterEnabled) {
697 			formatterBtnGrp.setSelected(rbUseGoogle.getModel(), true);
698 		} else {
699 			formatterBtnGrp.setSelected(rbUseNetBeans.getModel(), true);
700 		}
701 
702 		if (JavaFormatterOptions.Style.AOSP.name().equals(googleFormatterCodeStyle)) {
703 			googleCodeStyleBtnGrp.setSelected(aospRdBtn.getModel(), true);
704 		} else {
705 			googleCodeStyleBtnGrp.setSelected(googleCodeStyleRdBtn.getModel(), true);
706 		}
707 
708 		useIndentationSettingsChkBox.setSelected(useIndentationSettings);
709 		overrideTabSizeChkBox.setSelected(overrideTabSize);
710 		overrideTabSizeSpn.setValue(overrideTabSizeValue);
711 
712 		cbShowNotifications.setSelected(showNotifications);
713 		cbEnableSaveAction.setSelected(enableSaveAction);
714 		//depends on cbEnableSaveAction
715 		cbEnableSaveActionModifiedLinesOnly.setSelected(enableSaveActionModifiedLines);
716 
717 		cbEnableSaveActionModifiedLinesOnly.setEnabled(enableSaveAction);
718 		cbPreserveBreakpoints.setSelected(preserveBreakpoints);
719 		cbUseProjectPref.setSelected(useProjectPrefs);
720 
721 		if (null == lineFeed || "".equals(lineFeed)) {
722 			//default = system-dependend LF
723 			cbLinefeed.setSelectedIndex(0);
724 		} else {
725 			cbLinefeed.setSelectedItem(lineFeed);
726 		}
727 
728 		if (null == sourceLevel || "".equals(sourceLevel)) {
729 			//default = No override
730 			cbSourceLevel.setSelectedIndex(0);
731 		} else {
732 			cbSourceLevel.setSelectedItem(sourceLevel);
733 		}
734 
735 		updateEnabledState();
736 	}
737 
738 	@NbBundle.Messages("ChooseProfile=--Choose profile--")
739 	private void loadEclipseFormatterFileForPreview(String formatterFile, String activeProfile) {
740 		formatterLocField.setText(formatterFile);
741 		final File file = new File(formatterFile);
742 
743 		cbProfile.setEnabled(false);
744 		lblProfile.setEnabled(false);
745 
746 		cbProfile.removeAllItems();
747 		if (file.exists()) {
748 			try {
749 				final FileObject fo = ConfigReader.toFileObject(file);
750 
751 				//only xml configurations contain profiles
752 				if (Settings.isXMLConfigurationFile(fo.getNameExt())) {
753 					List<String> profileNames = ConfigReader.getProfileNames(fo);
754 					cbProfile.addItem(Bundle.ChooseProfile());
755 
756 					String entryToSelect = null;
757 					for (String profileName : profileNames) {
758 						cbProfile.addItem(profileName);
759 						if (activeProfile != null && activeProfile.equals(profileName)) {
760 							entryToSelect = profileName;
761 						}
762 					}
763 					selectProfileOrFallback(entryToSelect, profileNames);
764 					cbProfile.setEnabled(true);
765 					lblProfile.setEnabled(true);
766 				}
767 			} catch (IOException | SAXException | ConfigReadException ex) {
768 				log.log(Level.WARNING, "Could not parse formatter config", ex);
769 			}
770 		}
771 	}
772 
773 	private void selectProfileOrFallback(String entryToSelect, List<String> profiles) {
774 		if (null != entryToSelect) {
775 			cbProfile.setSelectedItem(entryToSelect);
776 		} else if (profiles.size() == 1) {
777 			//only one entry (excl. default) -> choose the only valid item
778 			cbProfile.setSelectedIndex(1);
779 		} else {
780 			//fallback: ===choose profile==
781 			cbProfile.setSelectedIndex(0);
782 		}
783 	}
784 
785 	/**
786 	 * {@inheritDoc}
787 	 */
788 	@Override
789 	public void store() {
790 		preferences.put(Settings.ENABLED_FORMATTER, rbUseGoogle.isSelected() ? GoogleFormatterStrategy.ID : (rbUseEclipse.isSelected() ? EclipseFormatterStrategy.ID : NetBeansFormatterStrategy.ID));
791 		preferences.put(Settings.GOOGLE_FORMATTER_CODE_STYLE, googleCodeStyleRdBtn.isSelected() ? JavaFormatterOptions.Style.GOOGLE.name() : JavaFormatterOptions.Style.AOSP.name());
792 		preferences.put(Settings.ECLIPSE_FORMATTER_LOCATION, formatterLocField.getText());
793 		preferences.putBoolean(Settings.ENABLE_USE_OF_INDENTATION_SETTINGS, useIndentationSettingsChkBox.isSelected());
794 		preferences.putBoolean(Settings.OVERRIDE_TAB_SIZE, overrideTabSizeChkBox.isSelected());
795 		preferences.putInt(Settings.OVERRIDE_TAB_SIZE_VALUE, Integer.parseInt(overrideTabSizeSpn.getValue().toString()));
796 		preferences.putBoolean(Settings.SHOW_NOTIFICATIONS, cbShowNotifications.isSelected());
797 		preferences.putBoolean(Settings.ENABLE_SAVEACTION, cbEnableSaveAction.isSelected());
798 		if (Settings.FEATURE_FORMAT_CHANGED_LINES_ONLY) {
799 			preferences.putBoolean(Settings.ENABLE_SAVEACTION_MODIFIEDLINESONLY, cbEnableSaveActionModifiedLinesOnly.isSelected());
800 		}
801 		preferences.put(Settings.ECLIPSE_FORMATTER_ACTIVE_PROFILE, getSelectedProfile());
802 		preferences.putBoolean(Settings.PRESERVE_BREAKPOINTS, cbPreserveBreakpoints.isSelected());
803 		preferences.putBoolean(Settings.USE_PROJECT_PREFS, cbUseProjectPref.isSelected());
804 		preferences.put(Settings.LINEFEED, getLinefeed());
805 		if (cbSourceLevel.getSelectedIndex() >= 1) {
806 			preferences.put(Settings.SOURCELEVEL, "" + cbSourceLevel.getSelectedItem());
807 		} else {
808 			preferences.put(Settings.SOURCELEVEL, "");
809 		}
810 
811 		try {
812 			preferences.flush();
813 		} catch (BackingStoreException ex) {
814 			log.log(Level.WARNING, "Could not flush formatter settings", ex);
815 		}
816 
817 		ExternalFormatterPreferencesChangeSupport changeSupport = Lookup.getDefault().lookup(ExternalFormatterPreferencesChangeSupport.class);
818 		if (changeSupport != null) {
819 			changeSupport.fireChange();
820 		} else {
821 			log.warning("Could not find ExternalFormatterPreferencesChangeSupport in lookup!");
822 		}
823 	}
824 
825 	/**
826 	 * {@inheritDoc}
827 	 */
828 	@Override
829 	public boolean valid() {
830 		errorLabel.setText(" ");
831 		if (rbUseEclipse.isSelected()) {
832 			final String fileName = formatterLocField.getText();
833 			final File file = new File(fileName);
834 			final boolean isXML = de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options.Settings.isXMLConfigurationFile(file.getName());
835 			final boolean isEPF = de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options.Settings.isWorkspaceMechanicFile(file.getName());
836 			final boolean isProjectSetting = de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options.Settings.isProjectSetting(file.getName());
837 			if (isXML && cbProfile.getSelectedIndex() == 0) {
838 				//"choose profile" entry is selected
839 				return false;
840 			}
841 
842 			//use configuration from .settings
843 			if (cbUseProjectPref.isSelected()) {
844 				return true;
845 			}
846 
847 			if (file.exists() && (isXML || isEPF || isProjectSetting)) {
848 				return true;
849 			} else {
850 				errorLabel.setText("Invalid file. Please enter a valid configuration file.");
851 				return false;
852 			}
853 		}
854 		return true;
855 	}

892 
893 	private void updateEnabledState() {
894 		boolean isEclipseFormatterEnabled = rbUseEclipse.isSelected();
895 		boolean isGoogleFormatterEnabled = rbUseGoogle.isSelected();
896 
897 		lblFormatterFile.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
898 		browseButton.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
899 		formatterLocField.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
900 
901 		if (cbProfile.getSelectedIndex() != -1) {
902 			lblProfile.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
903 			cbProfile.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
904 		} else {
905 			lblProfile.setEnabled(false);
906 			cbProfile.setEnabled(false);
907 		}
908 
909 		useIndentationSettingsChkBox.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled || isGoogleFormatterEnabled);
910 		overrideTabSizeChkBox.setEnabled(useIndentationSettingsChkBox.isEnabled() && useIndentationSettingsChkBox.isSelected());
911 		overrideTabSizeSpn.setEnabled(overrideTabSizeChkBox.isEnabled() && overrideTabSizeChkBox.isSelected());
912 
913 		cbUseProjectPref.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
914 		cbLinefeed.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
915 		lblLinefeed.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
916 		cbSourceLevel.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
917 		lblSourceLevel.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled);
918 
919 		googleCodeStyleLbl.setEnabled(isGoogleFormatterEnabled);
920 		googleCodeStyleRdBtn.setEnabled(isGoogleFormatterEnabled);
921 		aospRdBtn.setEnabled(isGoogleFormatterEnabled);
922 		cbPreserveBreakpoints.setEnabled(isEclipseFormatterEnabled || isGoogleFormatterEnabled);
923 
924 		txtProjectSpecificHint.setVisible(!showsProjectSettings);
925 	}
926 
927 	String getLinefeed() {
928 		if (0 == cbLinefeed.getSelectedIndex()) {
929 			return "";
930 		}
931 		return cbLinefeed.getSelectedItem().toString();
932 	}
933
